Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: Sabrina: I am glad that the amulet worked out for you, sugar.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Sabrina: Do not be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one that you intend to marry.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Sabrina: I can see that sparkle in your eye, {0}. You must be head over heels in love. But I am afraid that a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Sabrina: Ah, I can see it in your eyes… There is a special someone in your heart. It just so happens that I am selling one of my precious 'Mermaid's Pendants'. Give that to your intended and they will know exactly what you mean.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: Sabrina: I have an important amulet to sell… but something tells me that you are not ready for it, {0}.
